document.full_text: the shuttle endeavour was cleared for a launch attempt on april 29 to deliver a new class of physics instrument to the international space station on nasa's next-to-last shuttle flight, officials said tuesday.
document.title: nasa clears shuttle endeavour for april 29 launch
lines_and_colors: the shuttle endeavour was cleared for a launch attempt on april 29 to deliver a new class of physics instrument to the international space station on nasa's next-to-last shuttle flight, officials said tuesday.
